text: qd samie allah qawl khwlt bnt thelbt alty tarajaeat fi shan zawjiha aws bin alsamt, wfyma sadar eanh fi haqaha min alzzihar, wahu qawlah lha: "ant ely kzhr amy", ay: fi hurmat alnkah, wahi ttdre 'iilaa allah teala; ltfryj krbtha, wallah yasmae tkhatbkma wmrajetkma. 'iina allah samie likuli qwl, basir bikuli shy', la tkhfa ealayh khafyt
